summary: Adds an alembic which can be used to make potions and poisons on the go.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Alchemical Apparati

Version: 1.0

Author: JustinOther

Description: Adds an alembic which can be used to make potions and poisons on the go. You\'ll be given an Alembic apparel item which, when equipped, will prompt the alchemy interface. Note that the menu will not pop up until after leaving your inventory/favorites menu.

Future: Mortar & Pestle item coming soon. When in place, potions and poisons will be more potent in the event the player has both items. Will also set it up to be sold or given as a quest reward in time.

Install: Place the ESP and BSA in Skyrim\\Data, then activate with your launcher, WryeSmash, or NMM.

Uninstall: Deactivate the plugin.

Thanks: Beth for the game and CK.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: JustinOther
